name: Juan y Carlos
description:
In our game, you play two prisoners linked by a chain. They constrain each other's movement.

Your goal is to escape from the prison while avoiding the obstacles and guard on your way.

You play together... but against each other at the same time.

The rules:
  • When you are spotted, you loose 1$
  • You both loose if one of the two player is spotted without cash left
  • The player who has the greatest amount at the end wins and escapes... not the other!

So, you need to cooperate in order to have a chance to escape. Let your "partner" without cash, and you loose with him. But in the end, all that matter is having more dollars than him, so don't be too indulgent!

Game engine : Unity

Pixel Art Editor : Aseprite

Sound Editing : Music Maker Jam and Audacity
